title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
content: Hello!I know that while Patrick/Yogg/Coldkey aka ScamKey has left a bad taste in our mouths, I have a proposal.I would like to (starting 1/1/2024) start a "History" series of wallets but using Ballet's custom cards.To do it right though, I would not be able to order the cards until the first of ea month (to get the accurate amount for the card denomination). And I would limit it to 4 decimals - which really should pretty close as it could vary depending on which exchange you are looking at and/or what time of day you look as well. I would do 50 of each card, ea month - perhaps auctioning the first 21 cards and then selling 22-50 as regular sales. I would need to work with some artists - any takers?   perhaps some of the ones who worked with scamkey would like to see a sort of rebirth of their art on this series? Take on new artists as well. Would have to work with artists to reach an agreeable compensation - ie a percentage of sales to artist or some other arrangement.I am brainstorming here so this may seem a bit scattered but I have time and ballet has a great turn around time so not worried about delays on production. (was that an issue with scamkey? hmmm... )I think the challenge with Ballet will to have them insure the cards are correctly numbered with the last 2 numbers being "01" thru "50".

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: SatsLife on June 08, 2023, 06:39:25 PMi'm in. thanks! as a contributing artist?

comments.author: Otillio1330
comments.body: I’d be in on this. Will we be able to reserve spots so you get the same number every month?  I really liked the history cards. It’s a shame I had to peel mine

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: Otillio1330 on June 08, 2023, 11:01:31 PMI’d be in on this. Will we be able to reserve spots so you get the same number every month?  I really liked the history cards. It’s a shame I had to peel mine  That could be possible for some but might be impossible if I auction 1-21But then could be available for 22-50

It’s a shame I had to peel mine  That could be possible for some but might be impossible if I auction 1-21But then could be available for 22-50Cool keep us posted.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Another idea would be to do an auction for January and the winners of ea lot then have the option of using those same numbers each month to keep the last 2 digits the same each month.

comments.author: SatsLife
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on June 08, 2023, 07:17:09 PMQuote from: SatsLife on June 08, 2023, 06:39:25 PMi'm in. thanks! as a contributing artist? Sure! Would love a rebirth of my history series from 2020 that are not tainted.

Sure! Would love a rebirth of my history series from 2020 that are not tainted. awesome! will reach out for some image files.
